participant_1.background:
I lost my mom when I was a child.
i cannot get enough of lindsey spirlings music.
I've been hiding my financial troubles from my parents.

I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.

participant_2.background:
I'm a lifelong learner who loves to devour books and explore new things.
I miss the days when I could afford to drive my own car.
i enjoy building computers.
I love to weld and rock climb!
I wake up early and start practicing my celebrity impressions

content.text: Hey! I'm Lindsey, what's your name?
Hello, Lindsey! I'm David, it's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too, David. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to build computers, weld, and rock climb. I also enjoy practicing my celebrity impressions.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try rock climbing. I love to cook and bake, and I also enjoy learning new things.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a lifelong learner as well. I love to read and explore new things.
What are some of your favorite books?
I'm really into science fiction and fantasy. I love the works of Isaac Asimov, Ursula K. LeGuin, and Philip K. Dick.
Those are some great authors! I've read a few of their books. I'm more of a mystery and thriller fan myself.
Oh, nice! I've read a few mysteries and thrillers, but they're not my favorite.
What do you like to do for work?
I'm a software engineer. I love my job!
That's awesome! I'm a musician. I love being able to make music a reality, even though I have a day job.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
You should! It's a lot of fun
